About us

Sheikh Hasina Medical College, Tangail is a government medical school in Bangladesh, established in 2014. It is situated at the Sabalia Area of Tangail city

In 2008, Before 9th Parliamentary Election of Bangladesh, Prime Leader of Bangladesh Awami League and nation's former Prime Minister Sheikh Hasina promised the people of Tangail to establish a government-financed medical school in Tangail city. As her party continued to rule as Government of Bangladesh for 2nd consecutive time in 2014, a decision was taken in August 2014 by the government to start Sheikh Hasina Medical College, Tangaill alongside five other new medical colleges (Jamalpur Medical College, Manikganj Medical College, Shaheed M. Monsur Ali Medical College, Patuakhali Medical College, Rangamati Medical College). SHMCT is the 24th public medical college of Bangladesh

Medical Ranking

Tangail Medical College (TMC) is a prestigious private medical institution with affiliation to the University of Dhaka. It is Established 2014 Being a notable medical entity, this college becomes an attraction for aspiring medical students and it is a reason, it attracts students in large numbers every year. Tangail Medical College is an established medical institute in Bangladesh which is dedicated to educating the medical students in modern medical science courses in various specialties including intensive treatments and practic knowledge of operation theaters.

Academic affiliation

tangail medical college is affiliated University of Dhaka

Entrance Exams

For Tangail Medical entrance exam 2021 candidate should be 17 years of age or more as of on July month of the ongoing year . The Tangail Medical College admissions are dependent on entrance exams , which are mainly merit - based wherein the aspiring candidates are required to secure at at least 50 % marks in physics , chemistry , and biology in their 10 + 2 examinations . Students are also eligible for direct admission seats if they secured 50 % marks in all subjects . College 22 , the

Course

Tangail Medical College courses have the MBBS program currently under the affiliation of the University of Dhaka. The courses offered include four and a half years and one year of mandatory internship after the final examination. The first year is of 2 year duration including Integrated basic medicine and community medicine. The second year is 1 year duration and teaches several domains like forensic, gynecology, surgery etc. The last and the third year of Tangail Medical College courses teache courses like ENT, orthopedic, eye, dentistry, emergency medicines etc.

contact us
